phy.help: LoRa PHY region: EU868, AS923, AU915, CN470, CN779, EU433, IN865, KR920, US915

over-the-air-activation.help: When set to 1 the application uses the Over-the-Air activation procedure, default: true

nb-trials.help: Indicates how many times join can be tried, default: 12

application-eui.help: Application IEEE EUI. In case of LW1.1 or greater this will be used as JoinEUI

network-key.help: AES encryption/decryption cipher network key, in case of LW1.0.x not used

nwkskey.help: AES encryption/decryption cipher network session key. In case of LW1.1 or greater is used as FNwkSIntKey

snwksintkey.help: Serving network session integrity key. For LW1.1 or greater

nwksenckey.help: Network session encryption key. For LW1.1 or greater

appskey.help: AES encryption/decryption cipher application session key

tx-max-size.help: User application data buffer maximum size, default: 64, MAX: 255

public-network.help: LoRaWAN will connect to a public network or private network, true = public network

duty-cycle-on.help: Enables/disables duty cycling. NOTE: Disable only for testing. Mandatory in many regions.

duty-cycle-on-join.help: Enables/disables duty cycling for JOIN requests (disabling requires duty-cycle-on to be disabled). NOTE: Disable only for testing!

lbt-on.help: Enables/disables LBT. NOTE: [This feature is not yet integrated].

automatic-uplink-message.help: Stack will automatically send an uplink message when lora server requires immediate response

max-sys-rx-error.help: Maximum timing error of the receiver in ms. The receiver will turn on in [-RxError : + RxError]

downlink-preamble-length.help: Number of preamble symbols need to be captured (out of 8) for successful demodulation

uplink-preamble-length.help: Number of preamble symbols to transmit. Must be <= 8

fsb-mask.help: FSB mask for upstream [Only for US915 & AU915] Check lorawan/FSB_Usage.txt for more details

fsb-mask-china.help: FSB mask for upstream [CN470 PHY] Check lorawan/FSB_Usage.txt for more details

rejoin-default-max-time.help: LW1.1 only! Maximum time in seconds between Rejoin requests.

rejoin-default-max-count.help: LW1.1 only! Maximum amount of messages which can be sent between Rejoin requests.

rejoin-type1-send-period.help: Rejoin type 1 sending period. NOTE: Rejoin message will be sent when this period has expired. Default is 1 week
